      "title": "Forgot Password Functionality",

        "Click on the 'Forgot Password?' link.",

      "id": "TC_LOGIN_005",
      "title": "Session Expiry",
      "priority": "P2",
      "steps": [
        "Log in with valid credentials.",
        "Wait for the session to expire (simulate by waiting or using a tool).",
        "Attempt to access a protected page."
      ],
      "expected_result": "User is redirected to the login page with a session expired message."
    },
    {
      "id": "TC_LOGIN_006",
      "title": "Brute Force Protection - Multiple Failed Attempts",
      "priority": "P1",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to the login page.",
        "Enter a valid username.",
        "Enter an incorrect password.",
        "Repeat the above step 5 times.",
        "Attempt to log in with the correct password."
      ],
      "expected_result": "User is temporarily locked out after multiple failed attempts, and an error message is displayed."
    },
    {
      "id": "TC_LOGIN_007",
      "title": "Security Edge Case - SQL Injection Attempt",
      "priority": "P2",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to the login page.",
        "Enter a valid username.",
        "Enter a SQL injection string as a password (e.g., ' OR '1'='1').",

      "expected_result": "The application does not log in the user and displays an error message without exposing any database errors."
    },
    {
      "id": "TC_LOGIN_008",
      "title": "Security Edge Case - XSS Attack Attempt",
      "priority": "P2",
      "steps": [
        "Navigate to the login page.",
        "Enter a valid username.",
        "Enter a script tag as a password (e.g., '<script>alert(1)</script>').",

      ],
      "expected_result": "The application does not execute the script and displays an error message."
    },
    {
      "id": "TC_LOGIN_009",
      "title": "Invalid Login - Empty Fields",
      "priority": "P1",
      "steps": [

      "expected_result": "An error message is displayed indicating that fields cannot be empty."
